servinfo.title: Replacement of Transmitter Battery
servinfo.ptxt: If transmitter becomes unreliable, replace transmitter battery as follows.

attention2.ptxt: Use care not to allow grease or dirt to be attached on the printed circuit board and the battery.

s1.ptxt: With tip of flat blade screwdriver put in slot of transmitter, pry it open.
Replace the battery (lithium disc-type CR 1620 or equivalent battery) so its (+) terminal faces “+” mark on transmitter.
Fit together transmitter (3) and install it into transmitter holder (4).
Make sure that door locks can be operated with transmitter.

item.ptxt: To prevent theft, be sure to break the transmitter before discarding it.
Dispose of the used battery properly according to applicable rules or regulations. Do not dispose of lithium batteries with ordinary household trash.
